page.title: 12SERVICE INDUSTRIES:WARDLEY
page.content: The Freightliner Terminal is one of 24 freightliner terminals and 10 container ports in the British Isles. They{transport}to almost all the countries in Europe. Their cases range from 20,30 to 40ft and they have trucks to haul these cases. They do not own many of their own trucks but use mainly the contractors' transport. They are largely subsidised by{British {Rail.}They work an average of 47 hours a week. Follingsby House Sewage Works takes house waste, processes it and releases it into the{River Don.}In the third stage the waste water is put into a tank with minute worms in which they destroy the bacteria. The water is cleansed further still and is then released into the River Don. This plant will shortly be closed.
